trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> objects.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods enable you to add and remove individual controls from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法可讓您新增及移除個別控制項的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> methods to add or remove all the controls from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A>方法來新增或移除集合中的所有控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can determine if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is a member of the collection by passing the control into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以判斷如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>集合的成員會藉由傳遞至控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Contains%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To get the index value of the location of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> in the collection, pass the control into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的位置的索引值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>在集合中，以便將控制項傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The collection can be copied into an array by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection.CopyTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 集合可以複製到陣列，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> if it is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>衍生類別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>如果它是集合的成員。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，以及至少一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>上控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項會加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, the radio button named `radioButton2` is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當按一下按鈕時，選項按鈕命名為`radioButton2`被移除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> representing the control that owns the control collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to add to the control collection.
Adds the specified control to the control collection.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method allows you to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the end of the control collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>方法可讓您新增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>控制項集合的結尾的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can also add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the collection by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以新增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>物件加入該集合使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> that you previously added, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>您先前加入，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> can only be assigned to one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> at a time.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>只指派給其中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>一次。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is already a child of another control it is removed from that control before it is added to another control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>已經是另一個則會從控制項移除之前它就會加入另一個控制項的控制項的子系。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>衍生類別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>上控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is added to the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 按一下按鈕時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項會加入至面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The specified control is a top-level control, or a circular control reference would result if this control were added to the control collection.
The object assigned to the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.

When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> method to ensure that the control is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" />方法，以確保控制項已加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> objects to add to the collection.
Adds an array of control objects to the collection.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects contained in the `controls` array are appended to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>所包含的物件`controls`陣列會附加至集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> method to quickly add a group of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the collection instead of manually adding each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> to the collection using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，以快速將群組新增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>物件加入該集合，而不是手動新增每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> that you previously added, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>您先前加入，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>衍生類別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>上控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls are added to the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當按一下按鈕時，兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項會加入至面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange(System.Windows.Forms.Control[])" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange(System.Windows.Forms.Control[])" /> method to ensure that the controls are added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange(System.Windows.Forms.Control[])" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange(System.Windows.Forms.Control[])" />方法，以確保您的控制項，加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Removes all controls from the collection.
You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove the entire collection of controls from a parent control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A>方法從父控制項移除整個控制項的集合。

trans-unit.source: To remove an individual control from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要從集合中移除個別控制項，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> method does not remove control handles from memory.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A>方法不會從記憶體移除控制項控點。

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dispose%2A> method to avoid memory leaks.
trans-unit.target: 您必須明確呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dispose%2A>方法，以避免記憶體流失。

trans-unit.source: To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>物件加入集合中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會移除所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>中的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>衍生類別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and at least one other control on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，和至少一個其他控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: The other controls are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, all the controls contained in the panel are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當按一下按鈕時，會從移除面板中所包含的所有控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear" /> method to ensure that all the controls are removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear" />方法，以確保會從集合中移除所有的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to locate in the collection.
Determines whether the specified control is a member of the collection.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> is a member of the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This method enables you to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is a member of the collection before attempting to perform operations on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您判斷是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>所屬的集合，然後再嘗試執行作業所在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to confirm that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> has been added to or is still a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，確認<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>已新增至或仍然是集合的成員。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> if it is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>衍生類別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>如果它是集合的成員。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，以及至少一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>上控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項會加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, the radio button named `removeButton` is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當按一下按鈕時，選項按鈕命名為`removeButton`被移除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> contains an item with the specified key.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> contains an item with the specified key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>對應至針對索引鍵<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
<see langword="true" /> to search all child controls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Searches for controls by their <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name" /> property and builds an array of all the controls that match.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> containing the matching controls.
The <paramref name="key" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or the empty string ("").
Retrieves the index of a control within the control collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to search for in the control collection.
Retrieves the index of the specified child control within the control collection.
A zero-based index value that represents the location of the specified child control within the control collection.
The control with an index value of zero is at the top of the z-order, and higher numbers are closer to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 具有索引值為零的控制項位於最上層的疊置順序，而較高的數字是愈接近下方。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="child" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> is not in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to search for in the control collection.

<see langword="true" /> to throw an exception if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> specified in the <c>child</c> parameter is not a control in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Retrieves the index of the specified child control within the control collection, and optionally raises an exception if the specified control is not within the control collection.

A zero-based index value that represents the location of the specified child control within the control collection; otherwise -1 if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> is not found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
The control with an index value of zero is at the top of the z-order, and higher numbers are closer to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 具有索引值為零的控制項位於最上層的疊置順序，而較高的數字是愈接近下方。

trans-unit.source: A return value of -1 is returned only when the `throwException` parameter is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值-1 會傳回時，才`throwException`參數是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="child" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> is not in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />, and the <paramref name="throwException" /> parameter value is <see langword="true" />.
Retrieves a reference to an enumerator object that is used to iterate over a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to locate in the collection.
Retrieves the index of the specified control in the control collection.
A zero-based index value that represents the position of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
If the control is not found in the collection, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOf%2A> method return value is -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在集合中，找不到控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法傳回值為-1。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control to search for.
Retrieves the index of the first occurrence of the specified item within the collection.
The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the control with the specified name in the collection.

If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOfKey%2A>稱為連續，最後一個傳回索引會檢查索引鍵的符合項目第一次，而且如果沒有相符項目，搜尋會從集合的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的比較不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, or an item with the specified key is not found, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果`key`參數是`null`或空字串或使用指定的項目找不到索引鍵，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOfKey%2A>傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>對應至針對索引鍵<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> in the collection.
The index of the control to retrieve from the control collection.
Indicates the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> at the specified indexed location in the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> located at the specified index location within the control collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />位於控制項集合中指定的索引位置上。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>, reference the collection object with a specific index value.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>，參考具有特定索引值的集合物件。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> is a zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: 索引值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>是以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> value is less than zero or is greater than or equal to the number of controls in the collection.
The name of the control to retrieve from the control collection.
Indicates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> with the specified key in the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> with the specified key within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />內的指定索引鍵與<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>對應至針對索引鍵<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> ，擁有這個<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
Removes the specified control from the control collection.
When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is removed from the control collection, all subsequent controls are moved up one position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>會移除從控制項集合，所有後續控制項都移一個位置，集合中。

trans-unit.source: You can also remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method, or remove all controls by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法或移除所有控制使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>物件加入集合中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> if it is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>衍生類別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>如果它是集合的成員。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，和一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項會加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, the radio button named `radioButton2` is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當按一下按鈕時，選項按鈕命名為`radioButton2`被移除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> method to ensure that the control is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" />方法，以確保會從集合中移除控制項。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to remove.
Removes a control from the control collection at the specified indexed location.
When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is removed from the control collection, all subsequent controls are moved up one position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>會移除從控制項集合，所有後續控制項都移一個位置，集合中。

trans-unit.source: You can also remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> that you previously added by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>您先前加入使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>物件加入集合中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes the first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> if the count of the collection is greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會移除第一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>衍生類別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>如果集合計數大於零。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and at least one other control on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，和至少一個其他控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: The other controls are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, the first control contained in the panel is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當按一下按鈕時，會從移除面板中所包含的第一個控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the child control to remove.
Removes the child control with the specified key.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>對應至針對索引鍵<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <c>child</c><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to search for.
The new index value of the control.
Sets the index of the specified child control in the collection to the specified index value.

When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.SetChildIndex%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> referred to by the `child` parameter is moved to the position specified by `newIndex` and the other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> references in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> are reordered to accommodate the move.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.SetChildIndex%2A>呼叫時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>所參考`child`參數會移至所指定的位置`newIndex`和其他<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>適應移動已重新排列。

trans-unit.source: The control with an index value of zero is at the top of the z-order, and higher numbers are closer to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 具有索引值為零的控制項位於最上層的疊置順序，而較高的數字是愈接近下方。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="child" /> control is not in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.ICloneable.Clone" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ICloneable> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
